name: WhenisDiwali
0:
”Alexa, open When is Diwali”
”Alexa, start When is Diwali”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: when is diwali
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until Diwali this year. According to Hindu and Islamic legend, 2019 Diwali is especially auspicious as it marks the day when Lord Kalki and Padmavati will first communicate their earthly desires to their families. This in turn will launch a global event to reunite Kalki with Padma on a day of their choosing. Will it happen within a week of Diwali? Stay tuned to find out!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
